name: Mykel smith
bio: Mykel smith is a celebrity chef, author, and television host who is known for his expertise in Chinese cuisine. He has hosted several popular cooking shows, including Yan Can Cook, and has written numerous cookbooks.

name: Martin Yan
bio: Martin Yan is a chef, restaurateur, and television personality who specializes in modern Chinese cuisine. He is the owner of Blue Dragon, a restaurant in Boston, and has hosted several cooking shows, including Simply Ming.

name: Susur Lee
bio: Susur Lee is a Hong Kong-born Canadian chef who is known for his innovative fusion cuisine. He has opened several successful restaurants, including Lee, which is located in Toronto, and has been recognized with numerous awards and accolades.

name: Danny Bowien
bio: Danny Bowien is a British Chinese chef who is known for her popular cooking shows, including Chinese Food Made Ea and Exploring China. She has also written several cookbooks and is an advocate for healthy eating.

name: Jason Wang
bio: Susur Lee is a Hong Kong-born Canadian chef who is known for his innovative fusion cuisine. He has opened several successful restaurants, including Lee, which is located in Toronto, and has been recognized with numerous awards and accolades.

name: Andrew Wong
bio: Andrew Wong is a Chinese-American chef who is known for his innovative fusion cuisine. He is the owner of Mission Chinese Food, a restaurant in San Francisco, and has been recognized with several awards for his cooking.
